channel.title: Few Simple Questions
channel.description:
Ok, I just have a few simple questions..
1. Is it possible to create custom items with custom names, but with other item's models and stuff, etc.
2. What is the file I edit and what do I search for to edit the ::help that pops up at start?
3. How do I make it so the server is online, and other's connect through my No-Ip thing?
Thats it, I'm going for the night, So I'll check in the morning ^^

item.title: Few Simple Questions
item.dc:creator: @metal_k0 metal k0
item.description:
@metal_k0 wrote:

easy thing just follow a tut look it up somewhere (to much to type XD)

Read full topic

item.title: Few Simple Questions
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

1.It is possible to create custom items/weapons using clients and diffrent arreys.

2.Just go to client.java and search something it says on that menu,then edit it how you want it to be.

3.Go to server development/help section and follow instruciton on a topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Few Simple Questions
item.dc:creator: @defyboy defyboy
item.description:
@defyboy wrote:

Nope…

No-IP is just a free DNS pointer. If you dont know what that is, http://www.justfuckinggoogleit.com/

http://www.no-ip.com/ or http://www.dyndns.com have everything you need.

Read full topic

item.title: Few Simple Questions
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Waffles Mr. Waffles
item.description:
@Mr_Waffles wrote:

Ok…I HAVE a no-ip thingy…but…is there a tut on the site on how to make it online so players log on through the no-ip?

I think i have an idea of how to do it, but I’m not sure…

Here’s my theory:

I think that there is the IP in a file somewhere(0.0.0.0:port) and you can edit it so instead of 0.0.0.0, you put in your no-ip address so thats how people log on online…

am i right?

if so, what file is that in, if not, can someone please send me a link to a tut on how to make it online where others connect over the no-ip?

plz and thanks ^^[br][size=1]Posted at: September 10, 2006, 11:34:13 PM[/size][hr]Bump?[br][size=1]Posted at: September 11, 2006, 06:46:37 PM[/size][hr]Please, Bump, I need some answers, Please.

Read full topic

item.title: Few Simple Questions
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Waffles, post:1, topic:13752”]Ok, I just have a few simple questions…

  1. Is it possible to create custom items with custom names, but with other item’s models and stuff, etc.

  2. What is the file I edit and what do I search for to edit the ::help that pops up at start?

  3. How do I make it so the server is online, and other’s connect through my No-Ip thing?

Thats it, I’m going for the night, So I’ll check in the morning ^^[/quote]

  1. You can change the name, stats and that. But you can’t change the picture.

  2. What? I think you mean the startup menu in the server. Try using the find button in client.java

  3. Follow a no-ip tut.

Read full topic
